mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.source_id AS "sourceId", a.source_table AS "sourceTable", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.platform AS "platform", a.title AS "title", a.url AS "url", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u4.name AS "user.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u4 ON u4.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_share( id, source_id, source_table, user_id, platform, title, url, create_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sourceId}, #{sourceTable}, #{user.id}, #{platform}, #{title}, #{url}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_share SET source_id = #{sourceId}, source_table = #{sourceTable}, user_id = #{user.id}, platform = #{platform}, title = #{title}, url = #{url} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) count FROM cms_share a WHERE a.source_table = #{sourceTable} AND a.source_id = #{sourceId} AND a.del_flag = '0'
